duck: Jean Pigozzi (born 1952) is an Italian businessman, art collector, philanthropist and photographer
Henri Pigozzi (Henri Théodore Pigozzi) (1898 – 1964) is a car merchant and industrialist
Luciano Pigozzi (born 1927) is an Italian film actor

wiki.text:
